description:
Whether you've been desperately searching for a wonderful resource for learning the art of smudging or if your interest simply perked up after seeing the Long Island Medium wafting smoke around the house after visiting with spirits, I'm glad you've found your way here.

For thousands of years, people have used sacred smoke to ward off evil, to cleanse people and homes of negative energy, and to attract greater health, love, and peace. In Smudging for the Beginner, I walk you through straightforward and easy to understand explanations and instructions.

Within an hour you will have a solid understanding of what smudging is, why you want to smudge, when to smudge, and how to do it. You will be empowered to begin shifting from negative vibrations which bring weight and darkness into your life to positive vibrations that attract your greatest health and happiest existence.

Smudging is a spiritual process that uses the power of your intention, combined with sacred smoke, to cleanse, heal, and restore people, animals, objects, and homes to a higher and more beautiful vibration. I welcome you to join me today and witness the power of this simple ritual to change your life for good.
title: Smudging for the Beginner
